name: Death Shroud Golem
description: A large golem that resembles a piece of fabric, often indistinguishable from a shroud, designed for grappling and restraining foes.
memorable: Its ability to camouflage itself as fabric and grapple opponents makes it a unique threat on the battlefield.
goals: To ambush and restrain enemies, using its grappling abilities to manipulate them in combat.
relations: May be created by powerful spellcasters or ancient beings.
environment: Typically found in abandoned ruins or areas of magical significance.
strengths: Immunities to various conditions and damage types make it difficult to defeat with conventional attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical effects that can bypass its defenses.
attacks: Uses a 'Smothering Slam' to grapple and restrain opponents, delivering bludgeoning damage while incapacitating them.
most_powerful_ability: Its 'False Appearance' allows it to disguise itself, setting up ambushes against unsuspecting foes.
senses: The golem has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to remain hidden until it attacks.
additional_information: Can manipulate grappled creatures to attack their allies.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells due to magic resistance.
Immunity to spells that alter its form due to immutable form.
